origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.get_financial_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves financial data for a specified company, including R&D expenditures, revenue, and other financial metrics.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company for which data is being requested.'}, {'name': 'data_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial data to retrieve, e.g., R&D expenditures, revenue.'}, {'name': 'time_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which data is requested, e.g., past five years.'}, {'name': 'technology_category', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific technology category within which the data is requested, e.g., fintech.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'financial_data', 'description': 'The requested financial data in a structured format.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.get_financial_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'京东数科', 'data_type'是'研发支出', 'time_period'是'过去五年', 'technology_category'是'金融科技'.
